trans-unit.source: Name of the cryptographic service provider which contains the private key container.
trans-unit.target: O nome do provedor de serviços de criptografia que contém o contêiner de chave privada.

trans-unit.source: File path to the p7b file to be used while signing the package.
trans-unit.target: Caminho do arquivo p7b a ser usado ao assinar o pacote.

trans-unit.source: SHA-256, SHA-384 or SHA-512 fingerprint of the certificate used to search a p7b file for the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Impressão digital SHA-256, SHA-384 ou SHA-512 do certificado usado para pesquisar o certificado em um arquivo p7b.

trans-unit.source: Signs a NuGet package with the specified p7b file.
trans-unit.target: Assina um pacote do NuGet com o arquivo p7b especificado.

trans-unit.source: Hash algorithm to be used while generating the package manifest file. Defaults to SHA256.
trans-unit.target: O algoritmo de hash a ser usado ao gerar o arquivo de manifesto do pacote. O padrão é SHA256.

trans-unit.source: Invalid value provided for '{0}'. For a list of accepted values, please visit https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/cli-reference/cli-ref-sign
trans-unit.target: Valor inválido fornecido para "{0}". Para obter uma lista dos valores aceitos, visite https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/cli-reference/cli-ref-sign

trans-unit.source: {0}: Invalid value for 'CertificateFingerprint' option. The value must be a SHA-256, SHA-384, or SHA-512 certificate fingerprint (in hexadecimal).
trans-unit.target: {0}: Valor inválido para a opção "CertificateFingerprint". O valor deve ser uma impressão digital de certificado SHA-256, SHA-384 ou SHA-512 (em hexadecimal).

trans-unit.source: Cng Key is not an RSA key.
trans-unit.target: A chave Cng não é uma chave RSA.

trans-unit.source: Name of the key container which has the private key.
trans-unit.target: Nome do contêiner de chave que tem a chave privada.

trans-unit.source: Can't find specified certificate.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível localizar o certificado especificado.

trans-unit.source: Can't find cng key.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível localizar a chave cng.

trans-unit.source: No package was provided. For a list of accepted ways to provide a package, please visit https://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/command-line-reference
trans-unit.target: Nenhum pacote foi fornecido. Para obter uma lista das maneiras aceitas para fornecer um pacote, visite https://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/command-line-reference

trans-unit.source: No '-Timestamper' option was provided the signed package will not be timestamped. To learn more about this option, please visit https://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/command-line-reference
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma opção '-Timestamper' foi fornecida, então o pacote assinado não receberá carimbo de data/hora. Para saber mais sobre essa opção, visite https://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/command-line-reference

trans-unit.source: No CertificateFile provided or provided file is not a p7b file.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum CertificateFile fornecido ou o arquivo fornecido não é um arquivo p7b.

trans-unit.source: Directory where the signed package should be saved. By default the original package is overwritten by the signed package.
trans-unit.target: Diretório em que o pacote assinado deve ser salvo. Por padrão, o pacote original é substituído pelo pacote assinado.

trans-unit.source: Switch to indicate if the current signature should be overwritten. By default the command will fail if the package already has a signature.
trans-unit.target: Opção para indicar se a assinatura atual deve ser substituída. Por padrão, o comando falhará se o pacote já tiver uma assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Hash algorithm to be used by the RFC 3161 timestamp server. Defaults to SHA256.
trans-unit.target: Algoritmo de hash a ser usado pelo servidor de carimbo de data/hora RFC 3161. O padrão é SHA256.

trans-unit.source: URL to an RFC 3161 timestamping server.
trans-unit.target: URL para um servidor de aplicação de carimbo de data/hora RFC 3161.

trans-unit.source: Signs a NuGet package.
trans-unit.target: Assina um pacote NuGet.

trans-unit.source:
nuget mssign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper https://foo.bar -CertificateFile foo.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer "4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a" -CertificateFingerprint "4003d786cc374004bfdfc4f3e8ef9b3a"
nuget mssign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper https://foo.bar -CertificateFile foo.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer "4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a" -CertificateFingerprint "4003d786cc374004bfdfc4f3e8ef9b3a" -OutputDirectory .\..\Signed
trans-unit.target:
nuget mssign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper https://foo.bar -CertificateFile foo.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer "4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a" -CertificateFingerprint "4003d786cc374004bfdfc4f3e8ef9b3a"
nuget mssign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper https://foo.bar -CertificateFile foo.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer "4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a" -CertificateFingerprint "4003d786cc374004bfdfc4f3e8ef9b3a" -OutputDirectory .\..\Signed

trans-unit.source: <package_path> -Timestamper <timestamp_server_url> -CertificateFile <p7b_file_path> -CSPName <cryptographic_service _provider_name> -KeyContainer <key_container_guid> -CertificateFingerprint <certificate_fingerprint>
trans-unit.target: <package_path> -Timestamper <timestamp_server_url> -CertificateFile <p7b_file_path> -CSPName <cryptographic_service _provider_name> -KeyContainer <key_container_guid> -CertificateFingerprint <certificate_fingerprint>

trans-unit.source: Sign a NuGet package by adding repository signature with specified p7b file.
trans-unit.target: Assinar um pacote do NuGet adicionando a assinatura de repositório com o arquivo p7b especificado.

trans-unit.source: Semicolon-separated list of package owners.
trans-unit.target: Lista separada por ponto e vírgula de proprietários do pacote.

trans-unit.source: Sign a NuGet package with repository signature.
trans-unit.target: Assinar um pacote do NuGet com assinatura de repositório.

trans-unit.source:
nuget reposign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper http://timestamper.test -CertificateFile certificates.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer 4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a -CertificateFingerprint 8599ADD1C62EE42E315EA887FF60908B7A7C6E9B -V3ServiceIndexUrl https://v3.index.test
nuget reposign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper http://timestamper.test -CertificateFile certificates.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer 4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a -CertificateFingerprint 8599ADD1C62EE42E315EA887FF60908B7A7C6E9B -OutputDirectory .\..\Signed -PackageOwners "owner1;owner2" -V3ServiceIndexUrl https://v3.index.test
trans-unit.target:
nuget reposign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper http://timestamper.test -CertificateFile certificates.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer 4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a -CertificateFingerprint 8599ADD1C62EE42E315EA887FF60908B7A7C6E9B -V3ServiceIndexUrl https://v3.index.test
nuget reposign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper http://timestamper.test -CertificateFile certificates.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer 4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a -CertificateFingerprint 8599ADD1C62EE42E315EA887FF60908B7A7C6E9B -OutputDirectory .\..\Signed -PackageOwners "owner1;owner2" -V3ServiceIndexUrl https://v3.index.test

trans-unit.source: <package_path> -Timestamper <timestamp_server_url> -CertificateFile <p7b_file_path> -CSPName <cryptographic_service_provider_name> -KeyContainer <key_container_guid> -CertificateFingerprint <certificate_fingerprint> -PackageOwners <package_owners> -V3ServiceIndexUrl <v3_service_index_url>
trans-unit.target: <package_path> -Timestamper <timestamp_server_url> -CertificateFile <p7b_file_path> -CSPName <cryptographic_service_provider_name> -KeyContainer <key_container_guid> -CertificateFingerprint <certificate_fingerprint> -PackageOwners <package_owners> -V3ServiceIndexUrl <v3_service_index_url>

trans-unit.source: Repository V3 service index URL.
trans-unit.target: URL do índice de serviço do repositório V3.
